alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 11:23PM CDT until April 12 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa... Sixmile Creek near Brookings affecting Brookings County. Split Rock Creek near Corson affecting Minnehaha County. Rock River at Rock Rapids affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rock River at Rock Rapids. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, the lower banks on the left side of the river will begin flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 11.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 14.2 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Rock River Rock Rapid 13.0 11.4 Sat 10 pm 14.1 13.6 12.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late Sunday night at 130 AM CDT.
